name: Twitch Chat Color Fix
description:
This is a small fix for the Twitch.tv chat to improve the readability of nicknames and /me messages, as some colors are too similar to the background color of the chat.
Note: Maintained only for the new layout and popout chat windows.
additional_info: Note: If you encounter any problems or have wishes regarding this fix, contact me on Twitch (username: Seritools), Twitter (@SeriTools) or on Steam ( http://steamcommunity.com/id/seritools/ ). Thanks! Changelog: Version 2.12: fixed for twitch page settings (17.01.2014) Version 2.11: added another color Version 2.10: added another color Version 2.09: fixed possibility of changing non-chat paragraph colors Version 2.08: added another color Version 2.07: added another color Version 2.06: added another color (turbo users are allowed to use #ffffff, seriously...) Version 2.05: added another color Version 2.04: added another color Version 2.03: added another color Version 2.02: added another color Version 2.01: added another color Version 2.00: /me messages will now be in the fixed color, too! Version 1.20: added another color Version 1.02 - 1.19: added additional colors, mostly turbo colors Version 1.01: forced the chat background color, as it wasn't applied sometimes Version 1.00: first release
